Welcome!

This is my website it explains a bit of what I do and provides an outlet for professional networking, and personal projects. I work as a Senior Designer and Frontend Developer for a Boston based web agency. I have 10 years experience and have worked on 100s of projects over that time. I am passionate about helping people use technology through design and code. I have a positive attitude and enjoy working on all types of projects.
